landing.title: Experienced Developer Available for Hire
landing.summary: Full stack software engineer with 4 years experience designing and developing structured software systems.

skills.name: Backend Development
skills.description: Spring-based Java/Kotlin for REST and gRPC services. Postgre, Redis, Firestore DBs. Project configuration with Gradle.

skills.name: Web Development
skills.description: Responsive websites in HTML5, CSS/SCSS. Rx/Redux-based React applications in ES6 JavaScript and Typescript.

skills.name: Systems Programming
skills.description: Large C++ projects. Safe multithreaded code in Rust. Deep understanding of performant data structures and algorithms.

skills.name: Mobile Development
skills.description: Dart/Flutter mobile apps for both iOS and Android. Stream-based BLoC state management. Firebase-powered backend.

skills.name: UX Design
skills.description: Interactive app prototyping in Figma. Usability Testing with real users. Frequent iterations based on feedback.

skills.name: Full Business Cycle
skills.description: Acquiring customers, gathering requirements, managing expectations, timely execution, long-term maintenance.
